document.full_text: the list of missing people in storm-ravaged tuscaloosa, alabama, has been reduced to 75 and the number of dead from the storms remains steady at 40, mayor walt maddox said on wednesday.
document.title: fewer missing, without power a week after tuscaloosa storms
lines_and_colors: the list of missing people in storm-ravaged tuscaloosa, alabama, has been reduced to 75 and the number of dead from the storms remains steady at 40, mayor walt maddox said on wednesday.
